story_sentences.english: Elara, a young historian, examined the <word id='_archaic' class='word-eng-link'>archaic</word> map, its faded lines running <word id='_abreast' class='word-eng-link'>abreast</word> of cryptic symbols she had never encountered.
story_sentences.korean: 젊은 역사학자 엘라라는 <word id='_archaic' class='word-target-kr'>고대의</word> 지도를 살폈는데, 그 희미한 선들은 그녀가 전에 본 적 없는 비밀스러운 기호들과 <word id='_abreast' class='word-target-kr'>나란히</word> 이어져 있었다.

story_sentences.english: She maintained a professional composure, any personal excitement hidden beneath a layer of scholarly <word id='_affectation' class='word-eng-link'>affectation</word> as her mentor observed her.
story_sentences.korean: 그녀는 지도교수가 지켜보는 가운데 학자적인 <word id='_affectation' class='word-target-kr'>가식</word> 아래 개인적인 흥분을 감추며 전문가적인 평정을 유지했다.

story_sentences.english: She did not <word id='_anticipate' class='word-eng-link'>anticipate</word> that this discovery would lead her into a perilous journey.
story_sentences.korean: 그녀는 이 발견이 자신을 위험한 여정으로 이끌 것이라고는 <word id='_anticipate' class='word-target-kr'>예상하지</word> 못했다.

story_sentences.english: Soon, she realized she needed an <word id='_ally' class='word-eng-link'>ally</word>, perhaps an <word id='_anonymous' class='word-eng-link'>anonymous</word> benefactor who understood the map's true meaning, if she were to decipher its secrets.
story_sentences.korean: 곧 그녀는 지도의 비밀을 해독하려면 지도의 참된 의미를 이해하는, 그녀와 <word id='_ally' class='word-target-kr'>동맹을 맺을</word> 사람, 어쩌면 <word id='_anonymous' class='word-target-kr'>익명의</word> 후원자가 필요하다는 것을 깨달았다.

story_sentences.english: A peculiar <word id='_aspect' class='word-eng-link'>aspect</word> of the map was a series of almost imperceptible dots, a strange <word id='_behavior' class='word-eng-link'>behavior</word> for a cartographer of that era, suggesting a hidden code.
story_sentences.korean: 지도의 한 가지 특이한 <word id='_aspect' class='word-target-kr'>측면, 양상</word>은 거의 감지할 수 없는 일련의 점들이었는데, 이는 그 시대 지도 제작자로서는 이상한 <word id='_behavior' class='word-target-kr'>행동</word>으로 숨겨진 암호를 암시했다.

story_sentences.english: Her <word id='_ceaseless' class='word-eng-link'>ceaseless</word> research began to <word id='_change' class='word-eng-link'>change</word> her understanding of known history, hinting at a forgotten civilization.
story_sentences.korean: 그녀의 <word id='_ceaseless' class='word-target-kr'>끊임없는</word> 연구는 기존 역사에 대한 그녀의 이해를 <word id='_change' class='word-target-kr'>변화시키기</word> 시작했고, 잊혀진 문명을 암시했다.

story_sentences.english: Elara, being an <word id='_enterprising' class='word-eng-link'>enterprising</word> researcher, decided to seek out a reclusive scholar rumored to possess texts that could <word id='_elucidate' class='word-eng-link'>elucidate</word> the map's obscure symbols.
story_sentences.korean: <word id='_enterprising' class='word-target-kr'>진취적인</word> 연구가였던 엘라라는 지도의 모호한 상징들을 <word id='_elucidate' class='word-target-kr'>명료하게 해줄</word> 수 있는 문헌들을 소장하고 있다는 소문이 있는 은둔 학자를 찾아 나서기로 결심했다.

story_sentences.english: The scholar's initial response was <word id='_equivocal' class='word-eng-link'>equivocal</word>, and her visit seemed to cause a slight <word id='_disturbance' class='word-eng-link'>disturbance</word> in his otherwise quiet life, making her wary.
story_sentences.korean: <word id='_equivocal' class='word-target-kr'>애매한</word> 것이었고, 그녀의 방문은 그의 평온했던 삶에 약간의 <word id='_disturbance' class='word-target-kr'>혼란</word>을 야기하는 듯하여 그녀를 경계하게 만들었다.

story_sentences.english: He spoke of an ancient <word id='_confederacy' class='word-eng-link'>confederacy</word> of guardians who had sworn to protect the civilization's secrets, and how they would <word id='_fortify' class='word-eng-link'>fortify</word> their defenses against any intruders.
story_sentences.korean: 그는 그 문명의 비밀을 지키기로 맹세한 고대 수호자들의 <word id='_confederacy' class='word-target-kr'>연합, 동맹</word>에 대해 이야기했고, 그들이 침입자들에 맞서 어떻게 방어를 <word id='_fortify' class='word-target-kr'>강화할</word> 것인지에 대해서도 언급했다.

story_sentences.english: The allure of the forgotten knowledge continued to <word id='_entice' class='word-eng-link'>entice</word> Elara, even though the path threatened to <word id='_cut' class='word-eng-link'>cut</word> the connections she had with the conventional academic world.
story_sentences.korean: 잊혀진 지식의 매력은 엘라라를 계속 <word id='_entice' class='word-target-kr'>유혹했고</word>, 비록 그 길이 그녀가 기존 학계와 맺고 있던 연결고리들을 <word id='_cut' class='word-target-kr'>나눌</word> 위험이 있을지라도 그러했다.

story_sentences.english: The scholar also hinted at a <word id='_frightful' class='word-eng-link'>frightful</word> cataclysm that led to the civilization's end, a power so immense it could <word id='_exterminate' class='word-eng-link'>exterminate</word> entire populations.
story_sentences.korean: 학자는 또한 그 문명의 종말을 가져온 <word id='_frightful' class='word-target-kr'>무시무시한</word> 대재앙, 즉 전 인구를 <word id='_exterminate' class='word-target-kr'>멸종시킬</word> 수 있을 만큼 엄청난 힘에 대해서도 암시했다.

story_sentences.english: The scholar's <word id='_reference' class='word-eng-link'>reference</word> to the cataclysm described a <word id='_mammoth' class='word-eng-link'>mammoth</word> wave of destruction, a truth so horrifying Elara almost wanted to <word id='_lose_sight_of' class='word-eng-link'>lose sight of</word> her quest.
story_sentences.korean: <word id='_reference' class='word-target-kr'>언급</word>은 <word id='_mammoth' class='word-target-kr'>거대한</word> 파괴의 물결을 묘사했는데, 너무나 끔찍한 진실이어서 엘라라는 거의 자신의 탐구를 <word id='_lose_sight_of' class='word-target-kr'>잊고</word> 싶을 정도였다.

story_sentences.english: But her resolve returned; she decided to first understand the <word id='_nuts_and_bolts' class='word-eng-link'>nuts and bolts</word> of the ancient guardians' defensive strategies, hoping to <word id='_improve' class='word-eng-link'>improve</word> her chances of a peaceful approach.
story_sentences.korean: 그러나 그녀의 결의는 되살아났고, 평화로운 접근 가능성을 <word id='_improve' class='word-target-kr'>개선하기</word> 위해 먼저 고대 수호자들 방어 전략의 <word id='_nuts_and_bolts' class='word-target-kr'>~의 기본</word>을 이해하기로 결정했다.

story_sentences.english: The scholar, seeing her determination, reluctantly agreed to <word id='_permit' class='word-eng-link'>permit</word> her access to a hidden chamber where old records were kept <word id='_separate' class='word-eng-link'>separate</word> from his main collection.
story_sentences.korean: 학자는 그녀의 결심을 보고 마지못해 그의 주요 소장품과 <word id='_separate' class='word-target-kr'>분리하여</word> 보관된 고대 기록들이 있는 숨겨진 방으로의 접근을 <word id='_permit' class='word-target-kr'>허락하기로</word> 동의했다.

story_sentences.english: These records revealed that the civilization faced not only external threats but also a <word id='_radical' class='word-eng-link'>radical</word> internal shift in philosophy, which some factions considered a <word id='_radical' class='word-eng-link'>radical</word>, dangerous departure from their traditions.
story_sentences.korean: 이 기록들은 그 문명이 외부의 위협뿐만 아니라 철학에서의 <word id='_radical' class='word-target-kr'>근본적인</word> 내부 변화에 직면했으며, 일부 파벌들은 이를 전통으로부터의 <word id='_radical' class='word-target-kr'>급진적인</word> 위험한 이탈로 간주했음을 드러냈다.

story_sentences.english: No one, not even the ruling class, seemed to have <word id='_immunity' class='word-eng-link'>immunity</word> from the consequences of these growing divisions and the eventual cataclysm.
story_sentences.korean: 지배 계급조차도 이러한 커져가는 분열과 궁극적인 대재앙의 결과로부터 <word id='_immunity' class='word-target-kr'>면제</word>를 받은 사람은 아무도 없는 듯했다.

story_sentences.english: Lena managed to <word id='_separate' class='word-eng-link'>separate</word> coded messages from mundane diary entries, but actionable intelligence was <word id='_sparse' class='word-eng-link'>sparse</word>.
story_sentences.korean: 레나는 암호화된 메시지들을 평범한 일기 항목들로부터 <word id='_separate' class='word-target-kr'>분리해</word> 냈지만, 실행 가능한 정보는 <word id='_sparse' class='word-target-kr'>희박했다</word>.

story_sentences.english: Each deciphered clue would <word id='_sting' class='word-eng-link'>sting</word> with the realization of how close, yet how far, they were from catching the culprits.
story_sentences.korean: 해독된 각 단서는 범인들을 잡는 데 얼마나 가까우면서도 얼마나 멀리 있는지를 깨닫게 하며 <word id='_sting' class='word-target-kr'>따끔따끔하게 했다</word>.

story_sentences.english: Miles decided to <word id='_support' class='word-eng-link'>support</word> a risky undercover operation, hoping to gather more <word id='_tangible' class='word-eng-link'>tangible</word> evidence.
story_sentences.korean: 마일즈는 더 <word id='_tangible' class='word-target-kr'>실재적인</word> 증거를 수집하기를 바라며 위험한 잠복 근무를 <word id='_support' class='word-target-kr'>지지하기로</word> 결정했다.

story_sentences.english: He knew he would have to <word id='_tolerate' class='word-eng-link'>tolerate</word> a great deal of uncertainty, and carefully <word id='_train' class='word-eng-link'>train</word> his focus on the primary suspects.
story_sentences.korean: 그는 많은 불확실성을 <word id='_tolerate' class='word-target-kr'>참아야</word> 하고, 주 용의자들에게 그의 초점을 신중하게 <word id='_train' class='word-target-kr'>~로 향하게 해야</word> 한다는 것을 알았다.

story_sentences.english: The evidence, once pieced together, painted an <word id='_unambiguous' class='word-eng-link'>unambiguous</word> picture of the thieves' next target, leaving <word id='_virtually' class='word-eng-link'>virtually</word> no doubt.
story_sentences.korean: 증거들이 하나로 맞춰졌을 때, 도둑들의 다음 목표에 대한 <word id='_unambiguous' class='word-target-kr'>명확한</word> 그림이 그려졌고, <word id='_virtually' class='word-target-kr'>사실상</word> 의심의 여지가 없었다.

story_sentences.english: With <word id='_virtually' class='word-eng-link'>virtually</word> all preparations made, they remained <word id='_wary' class='word-eng-link'>wary</word> of leaks from within the department, knowing the <word id='_wealth' class='word-eng-link'>wealth</word> of information the thieves possessed could include informants on the police force.
story_sentences.korean: <word id='_virtually' class='word-target-kr'>거의</word> 모든 준비가 완료되었지만, 그들은 도둑들이 가진 정보의 <word id='_wealth' class='word-target-kr'>풍부함</word> 속에 경찰 내 정보원이 포함될 수 있다는 것을 알고 부서 내부로부터의 누출을 <word id='_wary' class='word-target-kr'>주의 깊게</word> 경계했다.

stories.chapter_title: The Agile Maneuver and the Break With Tradition

story_sentences.english: The thieves were known to be incredibly <word id='_agile' class='word-eng-link'>agile</word>, capable of navigating complex security systems with ease, and their hideout was in an <word id='_ample' class='word-eng-link'>ample</word>, abandoned warehouse district.
story_sentences.korean: 도둑들은 믿을 수 없을 정도로 <word id='_agile' class='word-target-kr'>민첩하여</word> 복잡한 보안 시스템을 쉽게 통과할 수 있는 것으로 알려졌으며, 그들의 은신처는 <word id='_ample' class='word-target-kr'>넓은</word> 버려진 창고 지구에 있었다.

story_sentences.english: They seemed to choose their targets <word id='_arbitrarily' class='word-eng-link'>arbitrarily</word>, yet each theft was executed with precision, a signature style that almost made them <word id='_break_with' class='word-eng-link'>break with</word> their pattern of untraceability.
story_sentences.korean: 그들은 목표물을 <word id='_arbitrarily' class='word-target-kr'>임의로</word> 선택하는 것처럼 보였지만, 각 절도는 정밀하게 실행되었으며, 이는 거의 추적 불가능이라는 그들의 패턴을 <word id='_break_with' class='word-target-kr'>그만두게</word> 만들 뻔한 특징적인 스타일이었다.

story_sentences.english: The detective decided to <word id='_break_with' class='word-eng-link'>break with</word> conventional police procedure and set a trap using a piece of art with a tracking device of blinding <word id='_brightness' class='word-eng-link'>brightness</word> when activated.
story_sentences.korean: 형사는 기존의 경찰 절차와 <word id='_break_with' class='word-target-kr'>관계를 끊고</word> 활성화 시 눈부신 <word id='_brightness' class='word-target-kr'>빛</word>을 내는 추적 장치가 부착된 미술품을 이용해 덫을 놓기로 결정했다.

story_sentences.english: He hoped this would <word id='_conjure' class='word-eng-link'>conjure</word> an image of an easy score, and also tried to <word id='_conjure' class='word-eng-link'>conjure</word> up some courage in the informant to testify by offering protection.
story_sentences.korean: 그는 이것이 쉬운 목표물이라는 이미지를 <word id='_conjure' class='word-target-kr'>불러내길</word> 바랐고, 또한 보호를 제안함으로써 정보원에게 증언할 용기를 <word id='_conjure' class='word-target-kr'>간청하려</word> 노력했다.

story_sentences.english: Their inside man was a <word id='_correspondent' class='word-eng-link'>correspondent</word> for an art magazine, whose regular <word id='_correspondent' class='word-eng-link'>correspondent</word> with the art world gave him unique access and an air of legitimacy.
story_sentences.korean: 그들의 내부자는 미술 잡지의 <word id='_correspondent' class='word-target-kr'>통신원</word>이었는데, 미술계와의 정기적인 <word id='_correspondent' class='word-target-kr'>서신 왕래</word>는 그에게 독특한 접근성과 합법적인 분위기를 제공했다.

stories.chapter_title: The Durable Deception and the Fabricated Truth

story_sentences.english: The thieves' organization was surprisingly <word id='_durable' class='word-eng-link'>durable</word>, having evaded capture for years, led by a mysterious figure known only as 'The <word id='_dwarf' class='word-eng-link'>Dwarf</word>' due to his short stature but immense influence.
story_sentences.korean: 도둑들의 조직은 놀라울 정도로 <word id='_durable' class='word-target-kr'>지속되었으며</word>, 작은 키에도 불구하고 엄청난 영향력을 가진 '그 <word id='_dwarf' class='word-target-kr'>난쟁이</word>'로만 알려진 수수께끼의 인물에 의해 수년간 체포를 피해왔다.

story_sentences.english: Many believed this criminal mastermind to be <word id='_extinct' class='word-eng-link'>extinct</word>, a legend of the underworld, but recent activities proved otherwise.
story_sentences.korean: 많은 사람들은 이 범죄의 거물이 <word id='_extinct' class='word-target-kr'>멸종된</word>, 지하 세계의 전설이라고 믿었지만, 최근의 활동은 그렇지 않다는 것을 증명했다.

story_sentences.english: The detectives had to <word id='_fabricate' class='word-eng-link'>fabricate</word> a believable backstory for their undercover officer, ensuring every <word id='_flake' class='word-eng-link'>flake</word> of his assumed identity was consistent.
story_sentences.korean: 형사들은 잠복 경찰관을 위해 믿을 만한 배경 이야기를 <word id='_fabricate' class='word-target-kr'>만들어내야</word> 했고, 그가 꾸민 신분의 모든 <word id='_flake' class='word-target-kr'>파편</word>이 일관되도록 해야 했다.

story_sentences.english: Miles harbored a personal <word id='_grudge' class='word-eng-link'>grudge</word> against The Dwarf, whose actions had indirectly caused great <word id='_harm' class='word-eng-link'>harm</word> to a close friend years ago.
story_sentences.korean: 마일즈는 몇 년 전 그의 행동이 간접적으로 친한 친구에게 큰 <word id='_harm' class='word-target-kr'>손해</word>를 입혔던 '그 난쟁이'에 대해 개인적인 <word id='_grudge' class='word-target-kr'>원한</word>을 품고 있었다.

story_sentences.english: He believed the informant, though once a criminal, was now essentially <word id='_innocent' class='word-eng-link'>innocent</word> in this particular series of heists, merely a pawn caught <word id='_in_the_course' class='word-eng-link'>in the course</word> of the gang's operations.
story_sentences.korean: 그는 정보원이 한때 범죄자였지만, 이 특정한 연쇄 강도 사건에서는 본질적으로 <word id='_innocent' class='word-target-kr'>결백하며</word>, 단지 조직의 작전 <word id='_in_the_course' class='word-target-kr'>동안에</word> 붙잡힌 졸에 불과하다고 믿었다.

stories.chapter_title: The Liken Plan and the Prolonged Stakeout

story_sentences.english: The plan was to <word id='_leave' class='word-eng-link'>leave</word> the baited artwork in a gallery, and Miles couldn't help but <word id='_liken' class='word-eng-link'>liken</word> their elaborate trap to a spider's web.
story_sentences.korean: 계획은 미끼가 된 미술품을 갤러리에 <word id='_leave' class='word-target-kr'>떠나보내는 것</word>이었고, 마일즈는 그들의 정교한 덫을 거미줄에 <word id='_liken' class='word-target-kr'>비유하지</word> 않을 수 없었다.

story_sentences.english: He <word id='_literally' class='word-eng-link'>literally</word> held his breath as the gallery owner, a <word id='_moderate' class='word-eng-link'>moderate</word> man not easily swayed, agreed to their risky proposal.
story_sentences.korean: 쉽사리 동요하지 않는 <word id='_moderate' class='word-target-kr'>온건한</word> 성격의 갤러리 주인이 그들의 위험한 제안에 동의했을 때, 그는 <word id='_literally' class='word-target-kr'>실제로</word> 숨을 참았다.

story_sentences.english: They would have to <word id='_prolong' class='word-eng-link'>prolong</word> their surveillance, hoping to <word id='_purify' class='word-eng-link'>purify</word> the city of The Dwarf's influence once and for all.
story_sentences.korean: 그들은 감시를 <word id='_prolong' class='word-target-kr'>연장해야</word> 했고, 도시에서 '그 난쟁이'의 영향을 완전히 <word id='_purify' class='word-target-kr'>정화하기를</word> 바랐다.

story_sentences.english: Lena found a <word id='_reasonable' class='word-eng-link'>reasonable</word> explanation for the gang's choice of targets in the diary; they were selecting pieces made with <word id='_refined' class='word-eng-link'>refined</word> gold, easily melted down.
story_sentences.korean: 레나는 일기장에서 그 조직의 목표물 선택에 대한 <word id='_reasonable' class='word-target-kr'>이치에 맞는</word> 설명을 발견했다; 그들은 쉽게 녹일 수 있는 <word id='_refined' class='word-target-kr'>정제된</word> 금으로 만들어진 작품들을 선택하고 있었다.

story_sentences.english: Miles wanted to <word id='_reprove' class='word-eng-link'>reprove</word> himself for not seeing this pattern earlier; the clues were there, like a <word id='_resilient' class='word-eng-link'>resilient</word> thread woven through their crimes.
story_sentences.korean: 마일즈는 이 패턴을 더 일찍 보지 못한 자신을 <word id='_reprove' class='word-target-kr'>꾸짖고</word> 싶었다; 단서들은 마치 그들의 범죄를 관통하는 <word id='_resilient' class='word-target-kr'>탄력 있는</word> 실처럼 거기에 있었다.

stories.chapter_title: Retaining Hope and the Shabby Disguise

story_sentences.english: They had to <word id='_retain' class='word-eng-link'>retain</word> a sense of hope, even though leads were becoming <word id='_scarce' class='word-eng-link'>scarce</word> as the days turned into weeks.
story_sentences.korean: 며칠이 몇 주로 바뀌면서 단서가 <word id='_scarce' class='word-target-kr'>부족해지고</word> 있었음에도 불구하고 그들은 희망을 <word id='_retain' class='word-target-kr'>유지해야</word> 했다.

story_sentences.english: The <word id='_scope' class='word-eng-link'>scope</word> of The Dwarf's operation was wider than they imagined, and the undercover officer had to adopt a <word id='_shabby' class='word-eng-link'>shabby</word> appearance to blend in with the lower echelons of the art underworld.
story_sentences.korean: '그 난쟁이'의 작전 <word id='_scope' class='word-target-kr'>범위</word>는 그들이 상상했던 것보다 넓었고, 잠복 경찰관은 미술계 암흑가의 하층민들과 어울리기 위해 <word id='_shabby' class='word-target-kr'>초라한</word> 모습을 해야 했다.

story_sentences.english: It was a <word id='_short-lived' class='word-eng-link'>short-lived</word> assignment for many before him who failed to <word id='_solidify' class='word-eng-link'>solidify</word> their cover.
story_sentences.korean: 그것은 위장을 <word id='_solidify' class='word-target-kr'>결속시키지</word> 못하고 실패했던 그 이전의 많은 사람들에게는 <word id='_short-lived' class='word-target-kr'>단기간의</word> 임무였다.

story_sentences.english: The evidence needed to be <word id='_substantial' class='word-eng-link'>substantial</word> enough to ensure a conviction, as The Dwarf had a reputation for slipping through legal loopholes.
story_sentences.korean: '그 난쟁이'는 법적 허점을 빠져나가는 것으로 유명했기 때문에, 유죄 판결을 확실히 하기 위해서는 증거가 <word id='_substantial' class='word-target-kr'>튼튼해야</word> 했다.

story_sentences.english: A <word id='_substantial' class='word-eng-link'>substantial</word> amount of planning went into the final confrontation, which was set to occur in a seemingly <word id='_vacant' class='word-eng-link'>vacant</word> auction house.
story_sentences.korean: 겉보기에는 <word id='_vacant' class='word-target-kr'>텅 빈</word> 경매장에서 벌어질 예정인 마지막 대결에는 <word id='_substantial' class='word-target-kr'>상당한</word> 양의 계획이 투입되었다.

story_sentences.english: This <word id='_villain' class='word-eng-link'>villain</word>, The Dwarf, was always <word id='_wary_of' class='word-eng-link'>wary of</word> traps, his paranoia as legendary as his heists.
story_sentences.korean: 이 <word id='_villain' class='word-target-kr'>악당</word>, '그 난쟁이'는 항상 함정을 <word id='_wary_of' class='word-target-kr'>조심(경계)했고</word>, 그의 편집증은 그의 강도 행각만큼이나 전설적이었다.

story_sentences.english: The only clue to his true identity was a <word id='_shriveled' class='word-eng-link'>shriveled</word> rose he supposedly left at each crime scene, a peculiar calling card.
story_sentences.korean: 그의 진짜 정체에 대한 유일한 단서는 그가 각 범죄 현장에 남겼다고 알려진 <word id='_shriveled' class='word-target-kr'>시든</word> 장미 한 송이, 기묘한 명함이었다.
